pages.text: $(li)The Vindicators are very strong opponents. They are armed with an $(l:patchouli:weapons/iron_axe)Iron Axe$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be found in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/mansion)Mansions$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_fort)Illager Forts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_archer_tower)Illager Archer Towers$(/l), and in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
